net.varkhan.base.containers.array
Class BoolArrays

java.lang.Object
  net.varkhan.base.containers.array.BoolArrays

public class BoolArrays
extends java.lang.Object

Static boolean arrays manipulation utilities.

Utilities for manipulating arrays of booleans.

Method Summary

Method Detail

equals

public static boolean equals(boolean[] array1,
                             boolean[] array2)
Indicates whether two boolean arrays are equal.

Parameters:
array1 - the first array
array2 - the second array
Returns:
true iff the arrays are either both null or have the same number of elements, and the values of elements in the same positions are equal

indexOf

public static int indexOf(boolean item,
                          boolean... array)
Returns the position of the first occurrence of a value inside an array.

Parameters:
item - the value to search for
array - the array to search
Returns:
-1 if item was not found in array, the position of the first element of the array equal to item

indexOf

public static int indexOf(boolean[] array,
                          int pos,
                          boolean[] sub)
Returns the position of the first occurrence of an array as a subsequence of an other array.

Parameters:
array - the array
pos - the starting point in the array
sub - the subsequence to find
Returns:
the smallest index idx greater than pos such that the elements of array starting at idx are exactly those of sub (-1 is returned if sub is not a subsequence of array)

append

public static boolean[] append(boolean[] array,
                               boolean... elems)
Append elements to an array.

Parameters:
array - the array to append to
elems - the elements to append
Returns:
an array of booleans containing all the elements of array followed by all the elements in elems

prepend

public static boolean[] prepend(boolean[] array,
                                boolean... elems)
Prepend elements to an array.

Parameters:
array - the array to prepend to
elems - the elements to prepend
Returns:
an array of booleans containing all the elements in elems followed by all the elements of array

concat

public static boolean[] concat(boolean[] array,
                               boolean[]... arrays)
Concatenates several arrays.

Parameters:
array - the first array to append to
arrays - the arrays to append
Returns:
an array of booleans containing all the elements in the arrays, in order

subarray

public static boolean[] subarray(boolean[] array,
                                 int beg,
                                 int end)
Returns a segment of an array.

Parameters:
array - the source array
beg - the begining position of the segment, inclusive
end - the ending position of the segment, exclusive
Returns:
an array of booleans, of length end-beg, and containing all the elements between positions beg, inclusive, and end, exclusive, of the original array
